overview: Prior to joining Kadoink Scott Cahill served as CEO of Signature Wines. Over his four year tenure at the company, revenues increased by 500% and the company was twice named to the Inc. 500 list of fastest growing companies in the U.S. Previously, he was General Manager-International and Vice President of Sales and Marketing for Kinecta Corporation, a middleware software company that has since been acquired by Stellant (which was then acquired by Oracle). Prior to Kinecta, Mr. Cahill served as Vice president of Sales and Vice President of Channels for Impulse Buy Network, which was later acquired by Inktomi (which was then acquired by Yahoo!). Scott holds an MBA from the Wharton School at the University of Pennsylvania and a BS in Mechanical Engineering from Cornell University.
